title: 2. Design Phase
description: I work with you while creating mock-ups to ensure the product matches your vision and accomplishes your goals.

title: 3. Build Phase
description: I create your website from the ground up using the latest technologies. The final product will be fast, accessible, and secure.

title: 4. Launch Phase
description: I handle hosting, servers, deployments, backups, and more. You get a hassle-free website that just works.

title: 5. Support & Maintenance Phase
description: I work with you to iterate on your site, adding new features, applying security patches, and fixing occasional bugs.
